name: Retz And Relic
description:
Hi!

Controls:

Player 1 (Retz): w- up  a - left  d - right 

Player 2 (Relic): up arrow- up left arrow - left right arrow - right

 Bugs: -The score system isn't implemented 

-The Powerups are Glitchy 

-no game over 

How To Play

Collect snowballs, walk to each other to transfer snowballs, climb to the top and use the snowballs to redeem powerups
